 2022-10172022-09-23,  PS,  RCMP,  TB,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectFees in Respect of Fingerprinting and Criminal Record Verification (Reclaimed Names) Remission Order
PrecisFEES IN RESPECT OF FINGERPRINTING AND CRIMINAL RECORD VERIFICATION (RECLAIMED NAMES) REMISSION ORDER in order to waive an administrative fee that would otherwise be incurred by residential school survivors and their families seeking to reclaim names changed by the residential school system.
